definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Of course it's the bride's sister group.
sentences.chinese: 當然是新娘子的姐妹團嘍。

sentences.english: In the beginning, the bride's parents opposed her mariage, but at end, we agreed to.
sentences.chinese: 最初新娘子的爸媽反對這樁婚事，但最終還得同意了。

sentences.english: In the beginning, the bride's parents opposed her mariage, but at last, they agreed to.
sentences.chinese: 最初新娘子的父母反對這樁婚事，但最終還是同意了。

sentences.english: Why brides wedding day by wearing clothes dresses don't have a bag then?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼新娘子結婚當天所穿的衣服禮服忌有袋口呢？

sentences.english: Bride is often compared to half open blossom.
sentences.chinese: 新娘子通常被比作即將盛開的花朵。
這些都是新娘子的嫁妝啊。

sentences.english: Why can a  bride hide nothing?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼新娘子什麼也藏不住？

sentences.english: This is a picture of Shtefano with his bride, Viktoriya.
sentences.chinese: 這張照片是他與自己的新娘子維多莉亞的照片。

sentences.english: Village men created the clogs for their future brides.
sentences.chinese: 村裏的男人爲了未來的新娘子創作了這種木底鞋。

sentences.english: The bride was his first love, an entertainment reporter version.
sentences.chinese: 新娘子是他的初戀情人，一個娛樂版記者。

sentences.english: At first the bride’s parents opposed the marriage, but in the end they gave their consent.
sentences.chinese: 最初新娘子的父母反對這樁婚事，但最終還是同意了。

sentences.english: Master Lin Ming first took a wife, bride is missing on the night.
sentences.chinese: 林家少爺明通第一次娶妻，當晚新娘子就失蹤。

definition: ritual kneeling to heaven and earth by bride and groom in a old-fashioned wedding ceremony/same as 拜天地
(of the groom's family) to send a bridal sedan chair 花轎|花轿 to fetch the bride/to send a party to escort the bride to the groom's house
to worship heaven and earth/ritual kneeling by bride and groom in a old-fashioned wedding ceremony/also called 拜堂
attendant of the bride or bridegroom at a wedding
